title-group.article-title: Erratum to: UV-visible Spectrophotometric and Photochemical Characterization of Safranine-Fructose-Sodium Lauryl Sulphate System in Photogalvanic Cell

institution-wrap.institution: Department of Chemistry, Institute of Science, Banaras Hindu University

permissions.copyright-statement: ISSN 0003-701X, Applied Solar Energy, 2020, Vol. 56, No. 6, pp. 526–527. © Allerton Press, Inc., 2020.

custom-meta.meta-value: Power Electronics, Electrical Machines and Networks

sec.p: The original article can be found online at

sec.title: TITLE
sec.p: 1. Write small letter for ‘v’ of Visible in manu ript’s title “UV-visible Spectrophotometric and Photochemical Characterization of Safranine-Fructose-Sodium Lauryl Sulphate System in Photogalvanic Cell”.

sec.title: INTRODUCTION
sec.p: 2. Put ‘EDTA’ before DSS as: ‘Indigo caramine EDTA-DSS’ in second paragraph last line.

sec.title: MATERIALS AND METHODS
sec.p: 3. In subheading UV-Visible Spectrophotometric Study make small letter ‘v’ of ‘visible’.
4. In fifth line …cuvett of 1 cm …..on a UV-Visible spectrophotometer… of subheading ‘UV-Visible Spectrophotometric Study’ also make small letter ‘v’ of visible.
5. In the Fig. 2 put ‘c’ before ‘alomel’ of ‘Saturated calomel electrode’ and also correct spelling of ‘Illiminated’ to as ‘Illuminated’.

sec.title: RESULTS AND DISSCUSSION
sec.p: 6. Put small letter of “L” as ‘l’ in A = E.c.l., where E, c and l in 4th line of subheading Visible Absorption Spectra.

7. Put the Fig. 3 within subheading of Effect of Variation of Concentration of Safranine on Absorbance just before the Table 1 and followed by Effect of Variation of Concentration of Fructose of Absorbance.
8. Make bold the values of 3rd column of Table 1.

9. Put the Fig. 4 followed by Table 2with in subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of Fructose on Absorbance and just before the Effect of Variation of Concentration of Alkali on Absorbance.
10. Put ‘s’ in word ‘concentrations’ in the caption of the Fig. 4 and also put ‘s’ in word ‘concentrations’ in the caption of Table 2.
11. Make bold the values of 3rd column of Table 2.
12. Put the Fig. 5 followed by Table 3with in subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of Alkali on Absorbance and just before the Effect of Variation of Concentration of SLS on Absorbance.
13. Replace 0.10 with 0.100 in the first column of Table 3 and make bold the value of 3rd column of Table 3.
14. Replace ‘0.10–0.157 M’ to ‘0.100 to 0.157’ M in the caption of Fig. 5.
15. Put the Fig. 6 followed by Table 4with in subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of SLS on Absorbance and just before the subheading Photogalvanic Effect.

16. Put the Table 5 with in subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of Safranine on Electrical Output and just before the Effect of Variation of Concentration of Fructose on Electrical Output.

17. Put ‘s’ in the word ‘concentrations’ of the caption of Table 5 and also remove single right hand side bracket from the first column content i.e. Resultant concentration of safranine, 10–6 M of Table 5.
18. Please left hand side justifies the content ‘Resultant concentration of safranine, 10–6 M’ in Table 5.

19. Put the Table 6 with in subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of Fructose on Electrical Output and before the subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of alkali on Electrical Output.

20. Please put ‘up’ before upto 0.128 M (pH 13) in line 2nd of subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of alkali on Electrical Output. Also put the Table 7 after subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of Fructose on Electrical Output and before subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of SLS on Electrical Output.
21. Put ‘s’ in word ‘concentrations’ of the caption of Table 7 and also do left hand side justifies the content ‘Resultant concentration of alkali, M’ in Table 7.
22. Put ‘s’ in word ‘concentrations’ in the last line of first paragraph of subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of SLS on Electrical Output.
23. Put the Table 8 in subheading Effect of Variation of Concentration of SLS on Electrical Output and before the subheading i-V characteristics of the cell.
24. Make small ‘i’ in place of capital ‘I’ in subheading i-V Characteristics of the cell. Also put the subheading i-V Characteristics of the cell after Table 8.
25. Make small ‘i’ in place of capital ‘I’ in 3rd and 5th line of subheading i-V Characteristics of the cell.

26. Make small ‘i’ in place of capital ‘I’ in last line of first paragraph of subheading i-V Characteristics of the cell. Also replace the ‘-SLS’ of the sentence ‘The i-V curve of safranine-fructose -SLS system of cell is given in Fig. 7.’ with ‘with and without SLS’.
27. Make small ‘i’ in place of capital ‘I’ in the caption of Fig. 7.
28. Make small ‘i’ in place of capital ‘I’ in the formula ‘(1)’ and (2) i.e. Conversion efficiency =………. & Fill factor =….
29. Put the Table 9 before the subheading ‘Mechanism for Generation of Photocurrent in the Cell’.
30. Left hand side justifies the content ‘Electrical parameters in Table 9 and please put value ‘6’ in place of ‘5’ in power at power point value 13.56 as obtain from i-V curve in Fig. 7.
31. Put the unit of all electrical parameters in the 1st row besides abbreviation of each electrical parameter and remove unit from row 2nd and 3rd of Table 9.
32. Put the Fig. 8 in subheading ‘Mechanism for Generation of Photocurrent in the Cell’ and before the ‘CONCLUSIONS’.

sec.title: CONCLUSIONS
sec.p: 34. Put ‘(red)’ after ‘higher’ and before ‘wavelength’ in line 6th of 3rd paragraph of ‘CONCLUSIONS’ as “Therefore, if shifting towards higher (red) wavelength ….

facet.name: subject
facet.facet-value: Power Electronics, Electrical Machines and Networks
